name: Oxygen (itch)
description:
This game was made from the during the 2nd edition of the LvlUpGamejam in Fribourg, Switzerland. We'd like to thank all the organizers and sponsors of the event.

We chose the themes "Moon" and "Virus".

We hope you will enjoy playing the game as much as we had fun making it. Good luck and have fun.

Team Jelly Golems

Jony Pinheiro - Developper
Natanael Braga - Developper
Sylvain Pillet - Developper
Ruben Guerreiro - Designer
